fields.name: listName
fields.label: Name for list
fields.description: Enter a name for a list to grab

fields.name: listUrl
fields.label: Url to grab
fields.description: Enter a url to grab from (https://www.etc)

fields.name: listSelector
fields.label: List selector
fields.description: Enter a selector for a list you want to grab

fields.name: itemSelector
fields.label: Item selector
fields.description: Enter a selector for an item in your list

fields.name: titleSelector
fields.label: Title selector
fields.description: Enter a selector for the title of your item

fields.name: linkSelector
fields.label: Link selector
fields.description: Enter a selector for the link in your item

fields.name: cookieWallAcceptSelector
fields.label: Accept Cookies Selector
fields.description: Enter a selector for the accept button in the cookie wall, if present

fields.name: saveList
fields.label: Tick to save your list settings
fields.description: Enter a selector for the link in your item
